node.doctext:
<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything2" site="http://everything2.com" servertime="Sun Sep 28 01:15:14 2014">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="466462" parent_e2node="466440" author_user="discofever">The second mouse gets the cheese</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2115748" parent_e2node="2114087" author_user="JD">Gone Girl</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Bitriot" node_id="1793018" parent_e2node="1793017" author_user="Scout Finch">I waited under your streetlight like a hoodlum; like a moth</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="RedOmega" node_id="1455714" parent_e2node="628815" author_user="Scout Finch">Cut off that stupid goatee and move on</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2115680" parent_e2node="781528" author_user="etouffee">It's all a blank, which makes me think something far far worse has actually happened</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="IWhoSawTheFace" node_id="2071192" parent_e2node="1906294" author_user="haqiqat">I might not believe in God, but I sure as hell believe in the power of prayer</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="StuartO)))" node_id="1283518" parent_e2node="368137" author_user="The Custodian">The Jean-Paul Sartre Cookbook</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="mad girl's love song" node_id="623856" parent_e2node="623852" author_user="rax">Italian breasts in the sunshine</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Everyone2" node_id="1954827" parent_e2node="1807862" author_user="Ancientsnow">Dreams become stronger when desire sits at the edge of your bed</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="etouffee" node_id="1671129" parent_e2node="1671128" author_user="Posmella">The sky rained tears. I was sure.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="1476135" parent_e2node="35152" author_user="kthejoker">Abraham Lincoln</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="go ahead I'll listen" node_id="1081001" parent_e2node="1080971" author_user="Chras4">Tears must be shed to make room for the laughter</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Bitriot" node_id="1349892" parent_e2node="1349890" author_user="junkpile">Perpetual reminder to myself: good sex is possible</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="StuartO)))" node_id="1933542" parent_e2node="1902405" author_user="UterusHammer">August 4, 2007</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="locke baron" node_id="991540" parent_e2node="991535" author_user="swankivy">Sucks Less!</cooled>
</COOLEDNODES>
node.title: Cool Nodes XML Ticker
